general_advisory: Farmers are advised to grow short duration Rabi crops like Green gram, Black gram, Cowpea, Field pea, Lentil, Groundnut, Toria and Sunflower in medium/shallow lowlands utilizing the available soil moisture in the field. Farmers are advised to visit their crop fields regularly to check pest infestation.

advisory: Flowering to Physiological maturity stage - Control ear head caterpillar by spraying Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5% EC @ 400 ml/acre or Profenophos 50% EC @ 400 ml/acre. Spray in the evening hours for better results.
Gundhi Bug Management - Control Gundhi Bug by spraying Chlorpyriphos 20% EC @ 400 ml/acre in water.
Physiological maturity stage/Harvesting stage - Store groundnut in polythene lined gunny bags with desiccant like fused Calcium Chloride @ 250 grams/30 kg of seeds.
Ripening stage - Manage internode borer using Trichogramma chilonis card at weekly intervals. Spray Fipronil @ 600 ml/acre or Chlorantraniliprole 0.4 GR @ 4 kg/acre.
Vegetative to Fruiting - Control fruit fly by preparing a poison bait with Jaggery and DDVP in water.
Vegetative stage - Management includes proper Fertilizer Management and spraying of Boron micronutrient.
To manage Red Spider Mites in Marigold and Rose, spray wettable sulphur 80% WP or Fenpyroximate 5% EC in water.
